item.title: 阿里巴巴以美国芯片出口禁令为由取消云业务分拆
item.description:
Summary:
  • Alibaba says US chip curbs have created uncertainties
  • Also pauses Freshippo IPO
  • Starts external fundraising for overseas digital commerce arm
  • CEO lays out future development strategy
  • Reports Q2 revenue in line with analysts' estimates
翻译:概括：
  • 阿里巴巴表示美国芯片限制带来了不确定性
  • 盒马IPO也暂停
  • 开始为海外数字商务部门进行外部融资
  • CEO制定未来发展战略
  • 报告第二季度收入符合分析师的预期

Alibaba Group (9988.HK), has scrapped plans to spin-off its cloud business, citing uncertainties created by U.S. export curbs on chips used in artificial intelligence applications.翻译:阿里巴巴集团（9988.HK）取消了分拆云业务的计划，理由是美国对人工智能应用芯片的出口限制带来了不确定性。

The U.S. decision last month to ban the export to China of more chips used in artificial intelligence (AI) has created major uncertainties for the country's big tech companies.翻译:美国上个月决定禁止向中国出口更多用于人工智能（AI）的芯片，这给该国大型科技公司带来了重大不确定性。

Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) said on Wednesday it saw the curbs impacting its cloud services.翻译:腾讯控股（0700.HK）周三表示，该限制措施对其云服务产生了影响。

Thursday's announcement came alongside in-line second-quarter revenue from the Chinese e-commerce group, which in March had unveiled plans to carve out the cloud business as part of the biggest restructuring in its 24-year history.翻译:周四宣布这一消息的同时，这家中国电子商务集团第二季度的收入也与预期相符，该集团在 3 月份公布了开拓云业务的计划，作为其 24 年历史上最大的重组的一部分。

The company also put on hold plans for an initial public offering of its Freshippo groceries business but said it would prepare external fundraising for its international digital commerce group arm.翻译:该公司还搁置了盒马鲜生业务的首次公开募股计划，但表示将为其国际数字商务集团部门准备外部融资。

Alibaba's logistics division, Cainiao applied to list in Hong Kong in September.翻译:阿里巴巴旗下物流部门菜鸟于九月申请在香港上市。

Alibaba's U.S.-listed shares were down 8.5% at market open.翻译:阿里巴巴在美国上市的股价开盘下跌 8.5%。

"The market does not like surprises," Thomas Hayes, chairman at hedge fund Great Hill Capital said on the X social media platform.翻译:“市场不喜欢意外，”对冲基金 Great Hill Capital 董事长托马斯·海耶斯 (Thomas Hayes) 在 X 社交媒体平台上表示。

"Investors had hoped to receive separate shares of the cloud business in hopes the segment could achieve a higher multiple in the public markets due to its growth potential."翻译:“投资者原本希望获得云业务的单独股份，希望该部门能够因其增长潜力而在公开市场上实现更高的倍数。”

Analysts had in March estimated the cloud division could be worth between $41-60 billion but had warned that its listing could attract scrutiny from both Chinese and overseas regulators due to the reams of data it manages.翻译:分析师在 3 月份曾估计该云部门的价值可能在 41-600 亿美元之间，但警告称，由于其管理的大量数据，其上市可能会引起中国和海外监管机构的审查。

In September, Alibaba's former group CEO Daniel Zhang abruptly quit just two months after concentrating his focus on cloud computing.翻译:今年9月，阿里巴巴前集团首席执行官张勇在专注于云计算两个月后突然辞职。

The company then appointed Eddie Wu, one of Alibaba Group's co-founders and long-time lieutenant of former chief Jack Ma, as both CEO of Alibaba and the cloud business. Zhang also handed the group chairmanship to another co-founder, Joseph Tsai.翻译:随后，该公司任命阿里巴巴集团联合创始人之一、前首席执行官马云的长期副手吴彦祖兼任阿里巴巴首席执行官和云业务首席执行官。张还将集团主席职务交给了另一位联合创始人蔡崇信。

"Alibaba will not pursue a full spin-off of Cloud Intelligence Group in light of uncertainties created by recent U.S. export restrictions on advanced computing chips," Tsai told analysts on a post-earnings call.翻译:蔡崇信在财报后电话会议上对分析师表示：“鉴于美国最近对先进计算芯片的出口限制造成的不确定性，阿里巴巴不会寻求全面分拆云智能集团。”

Instead the group would focus on growing the cloud business and providing investment for its AI drivers, he said.翻译:他表示，该集团将专注于发展云业务并为其人工智能驱动程序提供投资。

The cloud unit will continue to maintain its independent operation, Wu added.翻译:吴补充说，云部门将继续保持独立运营。

Regulatory filings also revealed on Thursday that Ma's family trust plans to sell 10 million American Depository Shares of Alibaba Group Holdings for about $871 million.

DEVELOPMENT STRATEGY

Wu, presenting Alibaba's earnings for the first time on the call, also detailed its future strategy, saying that each of its businesses would face the market more independently and that they would conduct a strategic review to distinguish between "core" and "non-core" businesses.翻译:吴彦祖在电话会议上首次介绍了阿里巴巴的财报，并详细介绍了未来的战略，表示旗下各项业务将更加独立地面向市场，并将进行战略审查，区分“核心”和“非核心” ”企业。

"Core businesses are where we will keep our long-term focus, intensively invest resources, pursue R&D, enhance user experience," he said. The Alibaba restructuring broke it up into six units, managed by the group as a holding firm.翻译:“核心业务是我们长期关注的重点，集中投入资源、持续研发、提升用户体验。”他说。阿里巴巴重组将其分为六个部门，由集团作为控股公司管理。

"As for the non-core businesses, we will realise the value of these assets by turning them profitable as soon as possible or through other means of capitalisation."翻译:“对于非核心业务，我们将通过尽快实现盈利或者通过其他资本化方式实现这些资产的价值。”

They will also invest in and incubate innovative businesses for the future, he added, naming four units, including work communication and collaboration platform DingTalk and second-hand goods platform Xianyu as ones that will be allowed to operate as independent subsidiaries.翻译:他补充说，他们还将投资和孵化面向未来的创新业务，并指定工作沟通和协作平台钉钉和二手商品平台闲鱼等四个单位将被允许作为独立子公司运营。

In September, he told staff that the tech giant's two main strategic focuses going forward will be "user first" and "AI-driven".

EARNINGS IN LINE

Alibaba reported second-quarter revenue of 224.79 billion yuan ($31.01 billion), in line with the 224.32 billion expected by analysts, LSEG data showed.翻译:伦敦证券交易所数据显示，阿里巴巴第二季度营收为人民币 2,247.9 亿元（合 310.1 亿美元），与分析师预期的 2,243.2 亿元一致。

China's economic recovery has been uneven. While the industrial and the retail sectors have performed better than expected, the crisis-hit property sector has weighed on consumer confidence.翻译:中国经济复苏并不平衡。尽管工业和零售业的表现好于预期，但受危机打击的房地产业却打压了消费者信心。

Customer management revenue from Alibaba's commerce retail, which tracks how much money merchants provide Alibaba for placements and promotions, grew 3% year-on-year.翻译:阿里巴巴商业零售业务的客户管理收入同比增长 3%，该业务追踪商家向阿里巴巴提供的广告投放和促销费用。

Alibaba asked merchants to price aggressively during the country's Singles Day festival taking on competitors such as Douyin and PDD Holdings' (PDD.O) Pinduoduo which have been selling lower-cost products year-round.翻译:阿里巴巴要求商家在双十一期间积极定价，以对抗抖音和拼多多控股（PDD.O）拼多多等竞争对手，这些竞争对手全年都在销售低成本产品。

Alibaba International Digital Commerce, a business that includes platforms such as Lazada and AliExpress, however reported a 53% rise in revenues, with retail revenue up 73% year-on-year. Analysts had predicted that strong international growth might help Alibaba offset a tepid domestic market.翻译:然而，包括 Lazada 和 AliExpress 等平台在内的阿里巴巴国际电子商务业务的收入增长了 53%，其中零售收入同比增长 73%。分析师此前预测，强劲的国际增长可能有助于阿里巴巴抵消国内市场不温不火的影响。

The cross-border platform environment has become more intensely competitive with the emergence of PDD Holdings-owned (PDD.O) Temu.翻译:随着拼多多控股旗下（PDD.O） Temu的出现，跨境平台环境的竞争变得更加激烈。

($1 = 7.2481 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2481 人民币）

Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru and Casey Hall in Shanghai; Writing by Brenda Goh; Editing by Sam Holmes, Arun Koyyur and Jane Merriman翻译:Akash Sriram 在班加罗尔和 Casey Hall 在上海的报道；布伦达·吴 (Brenda Goh) 撰写；编辑：Sam Holmes、Arun Koyyur 和 Jane Merriman

item.title: 美国特使：下次部长级会议就世贸组织改革达成协议被视为“艰难”
item.description:
Summary:
  • Major ministerial meeting fixed for February 2024
  • WTO lost full adjudication powers in December 2019
  • U.S. proposes divisive 'sunset clause' - sources
翻译:概括：
  • 主要部长级会议定于 2024 年 2 月举行
  • 世贸组织于2019年12月失去全部裁决权
  • 美国提出分裂性“日落条款”——消息人士

It will be "hard" to reach a deal on fully restoring the World Trade Organization's (WTO) arbitration powers by a major meeting set for February 2024 and the system can persist without it, the U.S. ambassador to the WTO told Reuters on Thursday.翻译:美国驻世贸组织大使周四对路透表示，在定于 2024 年 2 月举行的一次重要会议上就完全恢复世贸组织仲裁权达成协议将是“困难”的，而且如果没有达成一致，该体系也可以继续存在。

Countries are reviewing a draft proposal deemed the most serious effort to date to reform the hobbled system which has been only partially functional since December 2019 due to U.S. blockages of judges to its top court the Appellate Body.翻译:各国正在审查一项提案草案，该草案被认为是迄今为止为改革这一陷入困境的体系所做的最认真的努力，该体系自 2019 年 12 月以来，由于美国阻碍法官进入其最高法院和上诉机构，该体系仅部分发挥作用。

However, the proposal leaves blank a section on whether the court - which then U.S. President Donald Trump accused of over-reach when he introduced the block - will be revived.翻译:然而，该提案在是否恢复法院方面留下了空白，当时的美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在提出禁令时指责法院越权。

Maria Pagan, the Deputy United States Trade Representative, said the talks had made "amazing" progress but thought it would be difficult to land a deal by the WTO's next ministerial meeting in Abu Dhabi in February 2024, as negotiators currently hope.翻译:美国副贸易代表玛丽亚·帕根表示，谈判取得了“惊人”进展，但认为世贸组织下一次部长级会议将于 2024 年 2 月在阿布扎比举行，很难像谈判代表目前希望的那样达成协议。

"I think that would be hard to achieve," she said, suggesting that negotiations continue throughout 2024. She added that the proposal had yet to address its "key concerns", like WTO judicial overreach.翻译:“我认为这很难实现，”她说，并建议谈判在 2024 年继续进行。她补充说，该提案尚未解决其“关键问题”，例如世贸组织司法越权。

Many other WTO members say later next year is too late, fearing that a U.S. presidential election in November 2024 would mean more scrutiny of the 28-year-old trade body that could tie negotiators' hands.翻译:许多其他世贸组织成员表示，明年晚些时候为时已晚，他们担心 2024 年 11 月的美国总统大选将意味着对这个拥有 28 年历史的贸易机构进行更多审查，这可能会束缚谈判代表的手脚。

While countries can currently still file trade complaints to a lower body, they cannot appeal findings they disagree with and dozens of multibillion-dollar disputes are now in legal limbo.翻译:尽管各国目前仍然可以向下级机构提出贸易投诉，但他们无法对他们不同意的调查结果提出上诉，数十起价值数十亿美元的争端目前处于法律困境。

Asked whether the U.S. could accept any form of revamped appeals bench, she said: "Because we don't believe that it's absolutely necessary I don't have an answer to that."翻译:当被问及美国是否可以接受任何形式的改进上诉法庭时，她说：“因为我们认为这不是绝对必要的，所以我对此没有答案。”

WTO delegates told Reuters that Washington has submitted proposals, including a so-called "sunset clause" that would automatically mean any future deal would one day expire. Asked to react, Pagan said: "This is fundamental for us. We don't want to just make changes and then watch the system again go sideways, and not be able to stop it."翻译:世贸组织代表告诉路透社，华盛顿已提交提案，其中包括所谓的“日落条款”，该条款将自动意味着任何未来的协议有一天都会到期。当被问及对此有何反应时，帕甘说：“这对我们来说至关重要。我们不想只是做出改变，然后看着系统再次横行，而无法阻止它。”

Countries have privately criticised this idea. "Why would we want to institutionalise a mechanism that gets us back to where we were before?," one delegate said on condition of anonymity since he cannot voice his country's position.翻译:各国私下批评了这一想法。 “为什么我们要制度化一种让我们回到以前状态的机制？”一位不愿透露姓名的代表表示，因为他无法表达自己国家的立场。

The United States has also proposed that "erroneous interpretations" previously made by the Appellate Body should be clarified, WTO delegates told Reuters. "We do want to engage with members in correcting some of those interpretations," Pagan said.翻译:世贸组织代表告诉路透社，美国还提议澄清上诉机构先前做出的“错误解释”。 “我们确实希望与成员合作纠正其中一些解释，”帕甘说。

Reporting by Emma Farge Editing by Mark Potter翻译:艾玛·法奇报道 马克·波特编辑
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 美国商务部将中国机构从实体名单中删除
item.description:
The U.S. Commerce Department said on Thursday it has removed the Chinese Ministry of Public Security’s Institute of Forensic Science from its entity list in a bid to convince Beijing to step up cooperation to halt the flow of the synthetic opioid fentanyl in the United States.翻译:美国商务部周四表示，已将中国公安部法医学研究所从其实体名单中删除，以说服北京加强合作，阻止合成阿片类药物芬太尼在美国的流动。

Washington put the institute on the list in 2020 over alleged abuses toward Uyghurs and other minority groups, effectively barring it from receiving U.S. exports. China has long questioned why the U.S. would expect cooperation on fentanyl while targeting the institute.翻译:华盛顿于 2020 年将该研究所列入名单，原因是该研究所涉嫌虐待维吾尔族和其他少数民族群体，实际上禁止该研究所接收美国出口产品。中国长期以来一直质疑美国为什么会在针对该研究所的同时期待芬太尼方面的合作。

The removal, according to a notice posted in the Federal Register, came after a "removal proposal" was received and reviewed, the department said in the posting, by a committee composed of representatives of the departments of Commerce, State, Defense, Energy, and sometimes, the Treasury.翻译:根据《联邦公报》上张贴的通知，该部门在收到并审查了“删除提案”后进行了删除，该委员会由商务部、国务院、国防部、能源部、有时，还有财政部。

Reporting by Paul Grant; Editing by Doina Chiacu and Chizu Nomiyama翻译:保罗·格兰特的报道；编辑：Doina Chiacu 和 Chizu Nomiyama
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国进口价格创七个月来最大跌幅
item.description:
U.S. import prices fell more than expected in October amid a broad decline in the costs of goods, the latest indication that inflation was retreating.翻译:由于商品成本大幅下降，美国 10 月份进口价格跌幅超出预期，这是通胀正在回落的最新迹象。

Import prices dropped 0.8% last month, the biggest drop since March, the Labor Department's Bureau of Labor Statistics said on Thursday. Data for September was revised higher to show prices increasing 0.4% instead of edging up 0.1% as previously reported. Economists polled by Reuters had forecast import prices, which exclude tariffs, falling 0.3%.翻译:美国劳工部劳工统计局周四表示，上月进口价格下跌 0.8%，为 3 月份以来最大跌幅。 9 月份数据向上修正，显示价格上涨 0.4%，而不是之前报道的小幅上涨 0.1%。路透社调查的经济学家此前预测，不含关税的进口价格将下跌 0.3%。

In the 12 months through October, import prices declined 2.0% after decreasing 1.5% in September. Annual import prices have now dropped for nine straight months. Data this week showed consumer prices were unchanged in October, while producer prices declined by the most in three-and-a-half years.翻译:截至 10 月的 12 个月中，进口价格继 9 月下降 1.5% 之后下降 2.0%。年度进口价格现已连续九个月下降。本周的数据显示，10 月份消费者价格指数保持不变，而生产者价格指数则出现三年半以来的最大跌幅。

Subsiding inflation, together with easing labor market conditions and cooling consumer spending, have bolstered expectations that the Federal Reserve is done raising interest rates. Financial markets are anticipating a rate cut next May, according to CME Group's FedWatch tool.翻译:通货膨胀的减弱，加上劳动力市场状况的缓解和消费者支出的降温，增强了人们对美联储不再加息的预期。根据芝商所 (CME Group) 的 FedWatch 工具，金融市场预计明年 5 月将降息。

Since March 2022, the Fed has hiked its policy rate by 525 basis points to the current 5.25%-5.50% range.翻译:自2022年3月以来，美联储已将政策利率上调525个基点至目前的5.25%-5.50%区间。

Imported fuel prices dropped 6.3%, reversing September's gain. The cost of imported food fell 0.6% after dropping 0.4% in September. Excluding fuels and food, import prices dropped 0.2% after dipping 0.1% in September. These so-called core import prices decreased 1.3% year-on-year in September.翻译:进口燃料价格下跌 6.3%，扭转了 9 月份的涨幅。进口食品成本继9月份下降0.4%后下降0.6%。不包括燃料和食品的进口价格继 9 月份下降 0.1% 后下降 0.2%。这些所谓的核心进口价格9月份同比下降1.3%。

The dollar has strengthened against the currencies of the United States' main trading partners this year, helping to dampen imported inflation pressures.翻译:今年美元兑美国主要贸易伙伴货币走强，有助于抑制输入性通胀压力。

Prices for imported capital goods dropped 0.2% after being unchanged in the prior month. But the cost of motor vehicles, parts and engines rose 0.3% following a 0.1% gain in September.翻译:进口资本货物价格继上月持平后下降 0.2%。但机动车辆、零部件和发动机的成本继 9 月份上涨 0.1% 后上涨 0.3%。

Consumer goods, excluding automotives dipped 0.1% after being unchanged in September. Higher borrowing costs are cooling domestic demand.翻译:消费品（不包括汽车）继 9 月份持平后下跌 0.1%。借贷成本上升正在冷却国内需求。

Prices of goods imported from China were unchanged after edging down 0.1% in September. They dropped 2.8% year-on-year in October, the largest decline since October 2009.翻译:自中国进口的商品价格在 9 月份小幅下降 0.1% 后保持不变。 10月份同比下降2.8%，创2009年10月以来最大跌幅。

The report also showed export prices fell 1.1% in October as prices for both agricultural and nonagricultural exports dropped. Export prices increased 0.5% in September. They tumbled 4.9% year-on-year in October after declining 4.3% in September.翻译:报告还显示，由于农产品和非农产品出口价格下降，10月份出口价格下降1.1%。 9月份出口价格上涨0.5%。继 9 月下跌 4.3% 后，10 月同比下跌 4.9%。

Reporting By Lucia Mutikani; Editing by Andrea Ricci翻译:露西娅·穆蒂卡尼报道；安德里亚·里奇编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟冯德莱恩：中国峰会旨在实现公平竞争环境
item.description:
European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Thursday that a key goal of the EU summit with China in Beijing in December was to achieve a level playing field in trade in light of market distortions.翻译:欧盟委员会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩周四表示，12月在北京举行的欧盟与中国峰会的一个关键目标是在市场扭曲的情况下实现公平的贸易竞争环境。

As one example, von der Leyen said Chinese overcapacity in the clean tech sector was set to worsen and be exported as its economy slowed down, worsening distortions in the EU market - which the bloc could not accept.翻译:冯德莱恩举例说，随着经济放缓，中国清洁技术领域的产能过剩将进一步恶化并出口，从而加剧欧盟市场的扭曲——这是欧盟无法接受的。

China's trade surplus with the EU was the highest in history last year, just below 400 billion euros ($434.96 billion), she said.翻译:她表示，去年中国对欧盟的贸易顺差创历史最高水平，略低于4000亿欧元（4349.6亿美元）。

"We do not accept distortion from the inside, we should not accept it from the outside either," she told a conference on China in Berlin, noting this was why the EU had launched an investigation into imports of Chinese electric vehicles.翻译:她在柏林举行的中国问题会议上表示：“我们不接受来自内部的扭曲，我们也不应该接受来自外部的扭曲。”她指出，这就是欧盟对中国电动汽车进口发起调查的原因。

"Europe is open for competition. Not for a race to the bottom."翻译:“欧洲对竞争持开放态度。而不是逐底竞争。”

Von der Leyen said, however, that as much as the EU would protect its interests, it would also seek to address disagreements with China through dialogue - for example at their Dec. 7-8 summit, which comes after U.S. President Joe Biden met this week with Chinese President Xi Jinping.翻译:不过，冯德莱恩表示，欧盟在保护自身利益的同时，也将寻求通过对话解决与中国的分歧，例如在美国总统乔·拜登会见特朗普之后举行的 12 月 7 日至 8 日峰会上。与中国国家主席习近平的一周。

"Our goal is to achieve a level playing field in our trade relationship with China," said the official, who has driven recent European efforts to "de-risk" from Asia's rising superpower.翻译:这位官员表示：“我们的目标是在与中国的贸易关系中实现公平的竞争环境。”他最近推动欧洲努力“降低”来自亚洲崛起超级大国的风险。

"We will go to China in good faith," said von der Leyen. "We will never be shy in raising our concerns. But we must leave space for a discussion on a more ambitious relationship that benefits both of sides."翻译:冯德莱恩表示：“我们将真诚地前往中国。” “我们永远不会羞于提出我们的担忧。但我们必须留出空间，讨论建立更雄心勃勃、对双方都有利的关系。”

Von der Leyen said she expected action from China to deal with the current imbalances.翻译:冯德莱恩表示，她预计中国将采取行动解决当前的失衡问题。

"The story of how we relate to China is not yet fully written. Nothing is predetermined, we have agency and China is capable of change."翻译:“我们与中国的关系还没有完全写好。没有什么是预先确定的，我们有代理权，中国有能力改变。”

item.title: 亚洲强队在世界杯预选赛中取得胜利，进球不断
item.description:
Japan, South Korea and Australia all notched up comfortable wins on Thursday as the second phase of Asia's preliminaries for the 2026 World Cup kicked off for the region's dominant nations with few surprises and a flurry of goals.翻译:周四，随着 2026 年世界杯亚洲区预选赛第二阶段的拉开帷幕，日本、韩国和澳大利亚都轻松获胜，该地区的主力球队几乎没有什么意外，并取得了一系列进球。

Japan's Ayase Ueda scored a hat-trick as a largely second-string side defeated Myanmar 5-0 after Hajime Moriyasu chose to leave many of his leading performers on the bench ahead of their more exacting Group B clash with Syria in Jeddah on Tuesday.翻译:日本队的上田绫濑上演了帽子戏法，这支二线球队周二在吉达与叙利亚队进行更严格的 B 组比赛，森保肇选择将多名优秀球员留在替补席上，最终以 5-0 击败了缅甸队。

Ueda put the Japanese ahead in the 11th minute at Suita Stadium outside Osaka when he headed in Takumi Minamino's lofted pass and Daichi Kamada doubled the advantage 17 minutes later from distance.翻译:第 11 分钟，上田在大阪郊外的吹田体育场接应南野拓实的高空传球头球破门，为日本队取得领先，17 分钟后镰田大地从远距离将优势扩大一倍。

Ritsu Doan's angled through ball set up Ueda to claim his second in first-half injury time with a neat first-time finish and he completed his hat trick five minutes into the second half after another Minamino dink unlocked the Myanmar defence.翻译:道安律 (Ritsu Doan) 的斜传球帮助上田在上半场伤停补时阶段以漂亮的第一次射门取得第二个进球，并在下半场五分钟时完成帽子戏法，此前南野拓哉的另一次扣篮解开了缅甸的防守。

Doan scored the fifth four minutes from time with a cool finish as the Japanese made light work of their visitors.翻译:多安在比赛还剩四分钟时打进第五球，日本队轻松击败了客队。

Australia were also untroubled as they completed a 7-0 demolition of Bangladesh in Group I with Jamie Maclaren stepping off the bench to score a second half hat-trick.翻译:澳大利亚队也没有遇到麻烦，他们在第一组以 7-0 大胜孟加拉国队，杰米·麦克拉伦替补上场，下半场上演帽子戏法。

Mitchell Duke hit a brace late in the first half as Australia trampled over the 183rd-ranked south Asians at Melbourne Rectangular Stadium.翻译:米切尔·杜克在上半场末梅开二度，澳大利亚队在墨尔本矩形体育场击败了排名第 183 位的南亚队。

Goals from Harry Souttar and Brandon Borrello had given the hosts a two-goal lead inside the first 20 minutes while Duke then scored twice in four minutes, nodding in a header from Metcalfe's assist before firing in a rebound off the post.翻译:哈里·苏塔尔和布兰登·博雷洛的进球让主队在前20分钟内取得了两球领先优势，而杜克大学随后在四分钟内梅特卡夫的助攻下梅开二度，头球攻门，然后在门柱处反弹。

Maclaren did all the damage in the second half, scoring from a Jordan Bos cross shortly after the restart before pouncing again in the 70th when a Massimo Luongo shot pinged off goalkeeper Mitul Marma.翻译:麦克拉伦在下半场造成了所有的伤害，在比赛重新开始后不久，他从乔丹·博斯的传中得分，然后在第 70 场再次猛扑，当时马西莫·隆戈的射门击中了门将米图尔·马尔马。

Lewis Miller then set up Maclaren's hat-trick goal in the 84th minute with another neat cross.翻译:第84分钟，刘易斯·米勒再次巧妙传中，为麦克拉伦上演帽子戏法。

The South Koreans, meanwhile, scored four times in the second half to hand Singapore a 5-0 defeat at Seoul World Cup Stadium, with captain Son Heung-min among the scorers.翻译:与此同时，韩国队在首尔世界杯体育场下半场连进四球，帮助新加坡队以 5-0 击败新加坡队，队长孙兴慜也是进球者之一。

Cho Gue-sung put Juergen Klinsmann's team in front a minute before the halftime break and Hwang Hee-chan added the second four minutes into the second half.翻译:曹贵成在中场休息前一分钟帮助尤尔根·克林斯曼的球队取得领先，黄熙灿在下半场后四分钟补时。

Son hit the third in the 63rd minute before Hwang Ui-jo's penalty and Lee Kang-in's late effort confirmed the victory for the Koreans in Group C.翻译:孙兴慜在第63分钟打进第三球，黄义祖罚点球，李康仁最后的射门确认了C组韩国队的胜利。

North Korea later play their first senior international in four years when they take on Syria in Jeddah in one of the last ties of the round.翻译:随后，朝鲜队在吉达迎战叙利亚队，这是该轮比赛的最后一场比赛，这是他们四年来首次参加成年国家队比赛。

item.title: 菲律宾拒绝中国关于在争议海域执行补给任务事先通知的要求
item.description:
The Philippines does not have to give China prior notice about resupply missions in its own territory in the South China Sea, saying the operations, including the "upkeep" of a grounded navy ship, are legitimate, its foreign ministry said on Thursday.翻译:菲律宾外交部周四表示，菲律宾不必就在南海本国领土上执行补给任务事先通知中国，并称这些行动，包括“维护”一艘搁浅的海军舰艇，都是合法的。

The Department of Foreign Affairs (DFA) also called on China to remove all "illegal structures" it built within the Philippines' exclusive economic zone (EEZ), cease reclamation in those areas and be accountable for the damage the activities caused.翻译:外交部还呼吁中国拆除在菲律宾专属经济区（EEZ）内建造的所有“非法建筑”，停止在这些地区进行填海造地活动，并对这些活动造成的损害承担责任。

China has repeatedly accused the Philippines of illegally entering its waters without its permission during its missions to transport food and water to Filipino soldiers living aboard a navy ship that Manila grounded at the disputed Second Thomas Shoal. The atoll is called Ayungin by the Philippines and Renai Reef by China.翻译:中国一再指责菲律宾在执行向菲律宾搁浅在有争议的仁爱礁的一艘海军舰艇上的菲律宾士兵运送食物和水的任务期间，未经中国允许非法进入其水域。该环礁被菲律宾称为阿云金，中国被称为仁爱礁。

"We are being asked to give prior notification each time we conduct a resupply mission to Ayungin Shoal. We will not do so," DFA spokesperson Teresita Daza said in a statement.翻译:外交部发言人特雷西塔·达扎（Teresita Daza）在一份声明中表示：“每次前往阿云金浅滩执行补给任务时，我们都被要求提前通知。我们不会这样做。”

China claims sovereignty over nearly the entire South China Sea, pointing to a line on its maps that cuts into the EEZs of Vietnam, the Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei and Indonesia. Taiwan, which China also claims as part of its territory, has said it does not accept Beijing's maps.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，并指出其地图上有一条线切入了越南、菲律宾、马来西亚、文莱和印度尼西亚的专属经济区。中国也声称台湾是其领土的一部分，台湾已表示不接受北京的地图。

The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said the line on China's maps had no legal basis, which Beijing rejects.翻译:2016年，常设仲裁法院表示，中国地图上的这条线没有法律依据，但北京方面对此予以否认。

U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin reiterated his support for the court ruling during a meeting with his Manila counterpart in Jakarta. Both have denounced harassment by China towards Philippine vessels conducting the resupply mission.翻译:美国国防部长劳埃德·奥斯汀在雅加达与马尼拉国防部长会面时重申了对法院裁决的支持。两人都谴责中国骚扰执行补给任务的菲律宾船只。

A spokesperson for the Philippines National Security Council on Thursday flagged a disinformation campaign by "propagandists" and "information operators" that aims to undermine U.S.-Philippines relations and sway public opinion in China's favour.翻译:菲律宾国家安全委员会发言人周四指出，“宣传者”和“信息操纵者”发起虚假信息活动，旨在破坏美菲关系并影响公众舆论，使之有利于中国。

The narratives include portraying "the relationship between the U.S. and the Philippines as superior-inferior relationship," said Jonathan Malaya.翻译:乔纳森·马来亚说，这些叙述包括将“美国和菲律宾之间的关系描述为上下关系”。

"It just so happened that in this particular dispute the interests of the United States and the Philippines aligned," Malaya told reporters. "We are cognizant of the fact that there will be a time that the interests of the Philippines and the U.S. will diverge."翻译:马来亚告诉记者：“碰巧的是，在这一特殊争端中，美国和菲律宾的利益是一致的。” “我们认识到，菲律宾和美国的利益终有一天会出现分歧。”

Since the grounding of the Sierra Madre ship at the atoll in 1999 in Manila's attempt to assert its sovereignty claim, China has repeatedly called on the Philippines to tow the vessel away, based on an agreement which Manila says does not exist.翻译:自1999年马尼拉试图主张其主权主张而导致马德雷山脉船只在环礁搁浅以来，中国一再呼吁菲律宾根据马尼拉称不存在的协议拖走该船。

"The Philippines has not entered into any agreement abandoning its sovereign rights and jurisdiction over its EEZ and continental shelf, including in the vicinity of Ayungin Shoal," Daza said.翻译:达扎说：“菲律宾尚未签署任何放弃其专属经济区和大陆架主权权利和管辖权的协议，包括阿云金浅滩附近的地区。”

The Second Thomas Shoal lies 190 km (118 miles) off the Philippine island of Palawan, well within the Manila's EEZ.翻译:仁爱礁距离菲律宾巴拉望岛 190 公里（118 英里），位于马尼拉专属经济区内。

China's embassy in Manila did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

item.title: 惠誉：工行美国子公司遭受的网络攻击不会对母行产生重大影响
item.description:
Ratings agency Fitch on Thursday said the recent cyberattack at ICBC Financial Services will not have a material impact on its Chinese parent, although it highlights growing threats to global payment networks from such incidents.翻译:评级机构惠誉周四表示，工银金融服务公司最近遭受的网络攻击不会对其中国母公司产生重大影响，尽管这突显出此类事件对全球支付网络的威胁越来越大。

The U.S. arm of Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd (ICBC) was hit by a ransomware attack last week that disrupted trades and sent ripples through the U.S. Treasuries market, where the bank acts as a broker for hedge funds and other market participants.翻译:中国工商银行（ICBC）美国分行上周遭受勒索软件攻击，导致交易中断，并在美国国债市场引发连锁反应，该行充当对冲基金和其他市场参与者的经纪人。

"We do not expect the incident to have any immediate impact on the parent bank's viability rating, nor will the bank's issuer default rating change as it remains driven by our expectation of support from the Chinese sovereign," the ratings firm said.翻译:该评级公司表示：“我们预计该事件不会对母行的生存能力评级产生任何直接影响，该行的发行人违约评级也不会发生变化，因为它仍然受到我们对中国主权支持的预期的推动。”

The U.S. unit primarily engages in providing global clearing, execution and financing services to institutional clients.翻译:美国部门主要为机构客户提供全球清算、执行和融资服务。

Reporting by Manya Saini in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D'Silva翻译:班加罗尔Manya Saini 的报道；编辑：阿尼尔·德席尔瓦

item.title: 中国的宣传框架习近平的美国转向
item.description:
What a difference eight months makes: In March, shortly after the U.S. shot down a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon, President Xi Jinping blamed it for challenges faced by China's economy, complaining of "all-round containment".翻译:八个月的变化有多大：3月份，在美国击落一个疑似中国监视气球后不久，习近平主席将中国经济面临的挑战归咎于美国，抱怨“全方位遏制”。

Then on Wednesday, U.S. President Joe Biden and Xi agreed to open a presidential hotline, resume military-to-military communications and work to curb fentanyl production, showing tangible progress in their first face-to-face talks in a year at a summit in California.翻译:随后在周三，美国总统乔·拜登和习近平同意开通总统热线，恢复军方间的沟通，并努力遏制芬太尼生产，这在他们一年来在峰会上首次面对面会谈中取得了切实进展。加利福尼亚州。

While key issues like U.S. sanctions on chip exports remain unresolved, Chinese state media is now striking a different tone, focusing on Xi's smile during past trips to Iowa, fireside chats with its residents, and sharing chocolates with Biden.翻译:尽管美国对芯片出口的制裁等关键问题仍未解决，但中国官方媒体现在却采取了不同的语气，重点关注习近平过去访问爱荷华州时的微笑、与居民的炉边谈话以及与拜登分享巧克力。

Clips from the summit on China's social media show the two leaders walking in gardens at the site of the talks, and chatting by Xi's official limousine, with discussion of U.S. tech curbs and tension over Taiwan featuring less prominently.翻译:中国社交媒体上的峰会片段显示，两位领导人在会谈现场的花园中散步，并在习近平的官方豪华轿车上聊天，而有关美国科技限制和台湾紧张局势的讨论则不那么突出。

The Chinese rhetoric seeks to show Xi to a domestic audience as Biden's equal and highlights his desire to stabilise ties as China grapples with a moribund economy, analysts say. It also sends a signal of approval to the bureaucracy and businesses on engaging with Americans.翻译:分析人士称，中国的言论旨在向国内观众展示习近平与拜登的平等地位，并强调他在中国应对垂死的经济之际稳定关系的愿望。它还向官僚机构和企业发出了批准与美国人接触的信号。

"It reflects a very strong desire on the part of Chinese leaders to stabilise relations with the U.S. and push for more cooperation," said Li Mingjiang, international relations scholar at the Rajaratnam School of International Studies in Singapore.翻译:新加坡拉惹勒南国际关系学院国际关系学者李明江表示：“这反映了中国领导人稳定与美国关系、推动更多合作的强烈愿望。”

"There's this fundamental message in the Chinese narrative that the Chinese leader is capable of managing China-U.S. relations ... he is the one who gives instructions to the U.S. and the American leadership on how to manage the bilateral ties."翻译:“中国的叙述中有一个基本信息，那就是中国领导人有能力管理中美关系……他是向美国和美国领导人指示如何管理双边关系的人。”

China's domestic propaganda machine worked overtime to pave the way for Xi's pivot, also evident at a dinner with U.S. executives, when he pledged that China was ready to be a "partner and friend" of the U.S. and there was "plenty of room for bilateral cooperation".翻译:中国的国内宣传机器加班加点地为习近平的转向铺平道路，这一点在与美国高管的一次晚宴上也可见一斑，当时他承诺中国已准备好成为美国的“伙伴和朋友”，并且“双边关系有足够的空间”。合作”。

With official ties still strained, Chinese state media has focused on relations between the people and emphasised the potential for cooperation and importance of the summit for the Asia-Pacific region.翻译:在官方关系仍然紧张的情况下，中国官方媒体将重点放在人民之间的关系上，并强调了亚太地区合作的潜力和峰会的重要性。

"The international community watches with bated breath, recognising the weight of this meeting," the state news agency Xinhua said in an editorial. "When China-U.S. relations are good, the region benefits; when relations sour, the region suffers."

'AMERICAN FRIENDS'

Xinhua also ran a 1,500-word report reminiscing about Xi's past visits to the U.S..翻译:新华社还发表了1500字的报道，回忆习近平历次访美经历。

"Xi never forgets his American friends and believes that people hold the key to state-to-state relations," the news agency said.翻译:该通讯社称：“习近平永远不会忘记他的美国朋友，并相信国家关系的关键在于人民。”

The report cited Iowans who helped coordinate a 1985 trip Xi made to the state as a young official, describing his "smile that would not stop", and lauding his curiosity. It also described Biden and Xi sampling chocolates from a box during a past exchange.翻译:报告援引爱荷华州人的话说，他们曾帮助协调习近平 1985 年作为一名年轻官员访问该州，描述了他的“笑容不会停止”，并赞扬了他的好奇心。它还描述了拜登和习近平在过去的一次交流中从盒子里品尝巧克力的情况。

Gary Dvorchak, an Iowan considered by Xi an old friend of China, said Xi's fondness for Iowa was genuine but that the Chinese leader also used his ties to the state for propaganda value.翻译:被习近平视为中国老朋友的爱荷华州人加里·德沃尔恰克(Gary Dvorchak)表示，习近平对爱荷华州的喜爱是真诚的，但中国领导人也利用他与该州的关系来达到宣传目的。

“It humanises him and it gives him an ability to show a connection to the American people and bypass the American media,” said Dvorchak.翻译:德沃查克说：“这让他变得人性化，让他能够绕过美国媒体，展现出与美国人民的联系。”

“They use it when they need to bolster his support domestically or internationally,” said Dvorchak, who said he thought it was canny public relations.翻译:德沃查克说：“当他们需要在国内或国际上支持他时，他们就会使用它。”他说，他认为这是精明的公共关系。

“Part of the reason it works is because those feelings are real.”翻译:“它之所以有效，部分原因是因为这些感觉是真实的。”

But even on censored Chinese social media users found ways to make critical comments on the tone of the official commentary.翻译:但即使是在受到审查的中国社交媒体上，用户也找到了对官方评论语气发表批评性评论的方法。

"Where did the relations improve? Tariffs, chips, studying overseas, none of these are mentioned."翻译:“关系改善在哪里？关税、芯片、留学，这些都没有提到。”

On the Weibo Chinese microblogging site, the most popular hashtag on Thursday still harked back to tension over Taiwan: "China must be and will be reunified."翻译:在中国微博网站微博上，周四最受欢迎的话题标签仍然让人回想起台湾的紧张局势：“中国必须而且将会统一。”

item.title: 拜登和习近平“直言不讳”的会谈达成了军事、芬太尼方面的协议
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping agreed on Wednesday to open a presidential hotline, resume military-to-military communications and work to curb fentanyl production, showing tangible progress in their first face-to-face talks in a year.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登和中国领导人习近平周三同意开通总统热线、恢复军队间沟通以及遏制芬太尼生产，这在一年来首次面对面会谈中取得了切实进展。

Biden and Xi met for about four hours on the outskirts of San Francisco to discuss issues that have strained U.S.-Chinese relations. Simmering differences remain, particularly over Taiwan.翻译:拜登和习近平在旧金山郊区会面约四个小时，讨论导致美中关系紧张的问题。分歧依然存在，尤其是在台湾问题上。

In a significant breakthrough, the two governments plan to resume military contacts that China severed after then-House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan in August 2022.翻译:两国政府计划恢复中国在时任众议院议长南希·佩洛西于 2022 年 8 月访问台湾后中断的军事接触，这是一项重大突破。

“We’re back to direct, open clear direct communication on a direct basis,” Biden said.翻译:拜登说：“我们回到了直接、公开、明确的直接沟通。”

In addition, Biden said he and Xi agreed to high-level communications.翻译:拜登表示，他和习近平同意进行高层沟通。 "He and I agreed that each one of us can pick up the phone call directly and we'll be heard immediately."

But in a comment likely to irk the Chinese, Biden told reporters later that he had not changed his view that Xi is a dictator.翻译:但拜登后来对记者表示，他并没有改变对习近平是独裁者的看法，这可能会激怒中国人。

"Well, look, he is. I mean, he’s a dictator in the sense that he is a guy who runs a country that is a communist country," Biden said.翻译:“嗯，看，他是。我的意思是，他是一个独裁者，因为他管理着一个共产主义国家，”拜登说。

Xi told Biden that the negative views of the Communist Party in the United States were unfair, a U.S. official told reporters after the meeting.翻译:一位美国官员在会后告诉记者，习近平告诉拜登，美国共产党的负面看法是不公平的。

Biden and Xi came into the talks looking to smooth over a rocky period in relations that took a turn for the worse after a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon transited the United States and was shot down by a U.S. fighter jet in February.翻译:拜登和习近平参加会谈是为了缓和两国关系的不稳定时期，自二月份一个疑似中国监视气球飞越美国并被一架美国战斗机击落后，两国关系变得更糟。

The White House said Biden raised areas where Washington has concerns, including detained U.S. citizens, human rights in Xinjiang, Tibet and Hong Kong and Beijing’s aggressive activities in the South China Sea.翻译:白宫表示，拜登提出了华盛顿关切的领域，包括被拘留的美国公民、新疆、西藏和香港的人权以及北京在南中国海的侵略活动。

"Just talking, just being blunt with one another so there’s no misunderstanding," Biden said.

MILITARY, TAIWAN

U.S. and China's militaries have had a number of near-misses and acrimonious exchanges over the past year. After the pledge to renew communications, U.S. Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin will meet his Chinese counterpart when that person is named, a senior U.S. official said.翻译:过去一年里，美国和中国军队发生了多次险些失手和激烈的交锋。一位美国高级官员表示，在承诺恢复沟通后，美国国防部长劳埃德·奥斯汀将在中国国防部长被任命后与其会面。

Biden and Xi agreed China would stem the export of items related to the production of the opioid fentanyl, a leading cause of drug overdoses in the United States. "It’s going to save lives,” Biden said, adding he appreciated Xi’s “commitment” on the issue.翻译:拜登和习近平一致同意，中国将阻止与阿片类药物芬太尼生产相关的产品出口， 阿片类药物芬太尼是美国吸毒过量的主要原因。拜登说：“这将拯救生命。”他补充说，他赞赏习近平在这个问题上的“承诺”。

Under the agreement, China will go directly after specific chemical companies that make fentanyl precursors, a senior U.S. official told reporters. He vowed to "trust but verify" Chinese actions on the drug.翻译:一位美国高级官员告诉记者，根据协议，中国将直接打击生产芬太尼前体的特定化学公司。他发誓要“信任但核实”中国对该药物的行动。

The two leaders also agreed to get experts together to discuss the risks of artificial intelligence.翻译:两位领导人还同意召集专家讨论人工智能的风险。

A U.S. official described an exchange over Taiwan, the democratic island that China claims as its territory. China's preference is for peaceful reunification with the Chinese-claimed island of Taiwan, Xi told Biden, the U.S. official said, but Xi went on to talk about conditions in which force could be used.翻译:一名美国官员描述了一场围绕台湾问题的交流，中国声称台湾是其领土。这位美国官员表示，习近平告诉拜登，中国倾向于和平统一中国声称拥有主权的台湾岛，但习近平接着谈到了可以使用武力的条件。

Biden said he stressed the need for peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait. The U.S. official said Biden argued to maintain the status quo and for China to respect Taiwan's electoral process.翻译:拜登表示，他强调台海需要和平与稳定。这位美国官员表示，拜登主张维持现状，并要求中国尊重台湾的选举程序。

"President Xi responded 'Look, peace is all well and good, but at some point we need to move towards resolution more generally'," the official quoted Xi as saying.翻译:这位官员援引习近平的话说：“习主席回应道，‘看，和平固然很好，但在某些时候我们需要更广泛地解决问题’。”

Xi also urged the United States to stop sending weapons to Taiwan and support China's peaceful "reunification" with Taiwan, Chinese state media said.翻译:中国官方媒体称，习近平还敦促美国停止向台湾运送武器，支持中国与台湾和平“统一”。

Bonnie Glaser, a Taiwan expert at the Germen Marshall Fund of the United States, said Xi seemed to have conveyed both threats and assurances on Taiwan.翻译:美国德国马歇尔基金会台湾问题专家葛来仪表示，习近平似乎既传达了对台湾的威胁，又传达了保证。

"The suggestion that a resolution needs to be found in the near term is a worrisome sign, even if he emphasized that there are no plans for military action against Taiwan in the coming years," she said.翻译:“尽管他强调未来几年没有计划对台湾采取军事行动，但需要在短期内找到解决方案的建议是一个令人担忧的迹象，”她说。

Biden said he asked Xi to use his influence with Iran to urge Tehran not to launch proxy attacks on U.S. targets in the Middle East as the Israel-Hamas conflict continues in Gaza.

RESPECT AND WARMTH

Biden welcomed the Chinese leader at the Filoli estate, a country house and well-manicured gardens about 30 miles (48 km) south of San Francisco, where they will move later for a summit of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum.翻译:拜登在位于旧金山以南约 30 英里（48 公里）的菲洛丽庄园迎接了中国领导人，菲洛丽庄园是一座乡间别墅，拥有精心修剪的花园，他们稍后将前往那里参加亚太经济合作组织 (APEC) 论坛峰会。

APEC meets amid relative Chinese economic weakness, Beijing's territorial feuds with neighbors and a Middle East conflict that is dividing the United States from allies.翻译:亚太经合组织会议召开之际， 中国经济相对疲软，北京与邻国存在领土争端，而中东冲突则导致美国与盟友分裂。

Xi came into the meeting looking for respect from the United States as China's economy struggles to recover from sluggish growth.翻译:在中国经济努力从增长乏力中复苏之际，习近平参加会议是为了寻求美国的尊重。

Biden, who had long sought the meeting, struck a warm, welcoming tone. Video of the two clasping hands in farewell after the meeting was posted on X by the Global Times, China's state-backed tabloid.翻译:拜登长期以来一直寻求这次会面，他的语气温暖而欢迎。中国官方小报《环球时报》在X上发布了两人会面后握手告别的视频。

"Planet Earth is big enough for the two countries to succeed," Xi told Biden as they and their delegations sat across from each other at a long table in an ornate conference room.翻译:“地球足够大，足以让两国取得成功，”习近平和两国代表团在一间华丽的会议室里面对面坐在一张长桌旁时对拜登说。

Biden said the U.S. and China had to ensure that competition between them "does not veer into conflict" and manage their relationship "responsibly."翻译:拜登表示，美国和中国必须确保两国之间的竞争“不会演变成冲突”，并“负责任地” 管理两国关系。

After lunch, the leaders took a short walk together in the manicured garden of the mansion following an interaction that lasted around four hours. Biden waved to reporters and gave a two thumbs up sign when asked how the talks were going. "Well," he said.翻译:午餐后，两位领导人在豪宅修剪整齐的花园里一起散步，并进行了约四个小时的互动。当被问及谈判进展如何时，拜登向记者挥手并竖起两个大拇指。 “好吧，”他说。

Xi told Biden as they began their talks a lot had happened since their last meeting a year ago in Bali, citing the impacts of the COVID pandemic, and calling the U.S.-China relationship "the most important bilateral relationship in the world."翻译:习近平在会谈开始时告诉拜登，自一年前上次在巴厘岛举行会议以来发生了很多事情，并提到了新冠病毒大流行的影响，并称美中关系是“世界上最重要的双边关系”。

"For two large countries like China and the United States, turning their back on each other is not an option," he said. "It is unrealistic for one side to remodel the other."翻译:“对于中国和美国这样的两个大国来说，互相背弃不是一个选择，”他说。 “一方改造另一方是不现实的。”

After the two met, Biden welcomed global leaders to the APEC meeting in San Francisco, where he said Xi regarded the visit as a homecoming given the city’s large Chinese population.翻译:两人会面后，拜登欢迎全球领导人出席在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织会议，他表示，鉴于该市华人人口众多，习近平将这次访问视为一次回家。

Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt; Additional reporting by Steve Holland, Michael Martina, Martin Pollard, Jeff Mason, David Lawder, David Brunnstrom and Andrea Shalal; Editing by Josie Kao and Stephen Coates翻译:特雷弗·亨尼卡特报道； Steve Holland、Michael Martina、Martin Pollard、Jeff Mason、David Lawder、David Brunnstrom 和 Andrea Shalal 的补充报道；编辑：Josie Kao 和 Stephen Coates

item.title: 中方希望空客公司坚定在华长期发展信心--发改委
item.description:
China has told Airbus (AIR.PA) it hopes the planemaker has firm confidence and determination in its long-term development in China while the firm said it "attaches great importance" to the Chinese market, the National Development and Reform Commission said on Thursday.翻译:国家发展和改革委员会周四表示，中国已告知空中客车公司（AIR.PA），希望该飞机制造商对在华长期发展有坚定的信心和决心，同时该公司表示“高度重视”中国市场。

The deputy head of China's state planner, Li Chunlin, met Airbus CEO Guillaume Faury on Wednesday, it said.翻译:报道称，中国国家计划生育委员会副主任李春林周三会见了空中客车公司首席执行官纪尧姆·福里。

item.title: 2024 年全球经济放缓但可能避免衰退
item.description:
Some of the major banks in the world expect global economic growth to slow further in 2024, squeezed by elevated interest rates, higher energy prices and a slowdown in the world's two largest economies.翻译:全球一些主要银行预计，受利率上升、能源价格上涨以及全球两大经济体经济放缓的挤压，2024年全球经济增长将进一步放缓。

The global economy is forecast to grow 2.9% this year, a Reuters poll showed, with next year's growth seen slowing to 2.6%.翻译:路透调查显示，今年全球经济预计增长 2.9%，明年增速预计放缓至 2.6%。

Most economists expect the global economy to avoid a recession, but have flagged possibilities of "mild recessions" in Europe and the UK.翻译:大多数经济学家预计全球经济将避免衰退，但也指出欧洲和英国可能出现“温和衰退”。

A soft-landing for the United States is still on the cards, although uncertainty around the Federal Reserve's monetary tightening path clouds the outlook. China's growth is seen weakening, exacerbated by companies seeking alternative cost-efficient production destinations.翻译:尽管美联储货币紧缩路径的不确定性给前景蒙上了阴影，但美国软着陆仍有可能。中国的经济增长预计会放缓，企业寻求替代的具有成本效益的生产目的地将进一步加剧这种情况。

item.title: 早盘竞价：石油衰退维持经济复苏
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

Ebbing oil prices are cheerleading this week's renewed optimism on U.S. disinflation - with retail soundings still perky into the Thanksgiving period and as the data diary shifts to housing and industry.翻译:油价下跌为本周美国通货紧缩重新带来乐观情绪——感恩节期间零售业的前景依然乐观，数据也转向住房和工业。

This week's stock and bond surge on news of a fresh decline in headline and 'core' U.S. consumer price inflation last month was underscored on Wednesday by data showing the biggest decline in producer prices in three and a half years.翻译:周三，生产者价格出现三年半来最大跌幅的数据突显了上个月美国整体和“核心”消费者价格通胀再次下降的消息，本周股票和债券飙升。

That drop, which takes annual producer price inflation as low as 1.3%, was driven largely by falling gasoline prices.翻译:这一下降使年度生产者价格通胀率低至 1.3%，主要是由于汽油价格下跌所致。

And so the ongoing retreat in crude prices keeps coloring that picture, with U.S. oil extending losses on Thursday on a mix of higher supply from the United States and lackluster energy demand from China.翻译:因此，原油价格的持续下跌继续给这一局面增添色彩，周四，由于美国供应增加和中国能源需求低迷，美国石油价格扩大跌幅。

U.S. crude stocks rose by 3.6 million barrels last week, according to the U.S. Energy Information Administration, twice what analysts had expected. And that meets news that China's oil refinery throughput fell back in October as industrial fuel demand weakened.翻译:根据美国能源信息署的数据，上周美国原油库存增加 360 万桶，是分析师预期的两倍。与此同时，有消息称，由于工业燃料需求减弱，中国十月份炼油厂吞吐量有所回落。

The overall energy and inflation picture is helping buoy consumption and stokes the 'soft landing' narrative investors are betting on.翻译:整体能源和通胀形势有助于提振消费，并推动投资者押注的“软着陆”叙事。

While U.S. retail sales growth cooled sharply last month, they were ahead of forecasts and upward revisions to prior months underlined the strength of the consumer, along with positive indications about the holiday quarter.翻译:尽管上个月美国零售销售增长大幅放缓，但仍高于预期，而且前几个月的上调突显了消费者的强劲势头，以及假期季度的积极迹象。

With investors eyeing Walmart earnings later, shares in Target (TGT.N) surged almost 20% on Wednesday after the retailer forecast a fourth-quarter profit above expectations on easing supply chain costs. That lifted shares of others including Macy's (M.N) and Kohl's (KSS.N) and the overall S&P 500 consumer staples index (.SPLRCS).翻译:由于投资者稍后关注沃尔玛的财报，塔吉特 ( Target ) (TGT.N)的股价周三飙升近 20%，此前该零售商预测第四季度利润将高于供应链成本缓解的预期。这提振了包括梅西百货(MN)和科尔百货(KSS.N)在内的其他公司的股价，以及整个标准普尔 500 消费必需品指数(.SPLRCS)的股价。

Even though Federal Reserve officials are refusing to fully rule out another interest rate hike in the cycle, San Francisco Fed chief Mary Daly described the latest inflation picture as 'very, very encouraging."翻译:尽管美联储官员拒绝完全排除在周期中再次加息的可能性，但旧金山联储行长玛丽戴利将最新的通胀情况描述为“非常非常令人鼓舞”。

Futures markets are even more encouraged and have taken another hike completely off the table - and now put about an 80% chance of a rate cut by May. And after consolidating Tuesday's plunge on Wednesday, Treasury yields have resumed their decline.翻译:期货市场更加受到鼓舞，并完全排除了再次加息的可能性——现在预计 5 月份降息的可能性约为 80%。在周三巩固了周二的暴跌之后，美国国债收益率又恢复了跌势。

Many Fed officials have pointed to housing as a key focus and the November NAHB index of housing market sentiment out later will be watched closely alongside industrial readings for last month.翻译:许多美联储官员指出，住房是重点关注的焦点，稍后公布的 11 月 NAHB 住房市场情绪指数将与上个月的工业数据一起受到密切关注。

The S&P500 (.SPX) hit its highest in more than two months on Wednesday and stock futures held the line ahead of the bell.翻译:标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)周三触及两个多月来的最高点，股票期货在盘前守住了这条线。

The mood was helped on confirmation a government shutdown this week was finally averted in the U.S. Senate.翻译:美国参议院本周最终避免了政府关门，这提振了人们的情绪。

The picture in overseas markets, where the economic picture is cloudier, was more mixed.翻译:经济形势较为阴暗的海外市场的情况则更为复杂。

Chinese stocks fell again (.CSI300) as investors were disappointed by a meeting between the leaders of the world's two largest economies and the property bust there smoldered.翻译:中国股市再次下跌（.CSI300） ，原因是投资者对世界两大经济体领导人之间的会晤感到失望，而且房地产泡沫破灭。

China's new home prices fell for the fourth month in October as government support measures did little to lift the gloom hanging over the debt-laden property sector.翻译:由于政府的支持措施未能缓解笼罩在负债累累的房地产行业的阴霾，中国10月份新房价格连续第四个月下跌。

There was a flat response to the long-awaited meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping in San Francisco on Wednesday and concerns it did not deliver more, despite some signs of detente between the two leaders.翻译:人们对周三在旧金山举行的期待已久的美国总统乔·拜登和中国领导人习近平的会面反应平淡，并担心会议没有带来更多成果，尽管两国领导人之间有一些缓和的迹象。

Xi also told Biden that Taiwan was the biggest, most dangerous issue in U.S.-China ties, a senior U.S. official told reporters, while Biden responded by assuring Xi that Washington was determined to maintain peace in the region.翻译:一位美国高级官员告诉记者，习近平还告诉拜登，台湾是美中关系中最大、最危险的问题，而拜登则向习近平保证，华盛顿决心维护该地区的和平。翻译:拜登的回应是向习近平保证华盛顿决心维护该地区的和平。

Elsewhere, Japanese exports grew for a second straight month in October but at a sharply slower pace due to slumping China-bound shipments of chips and steel.翻译:其他方面， 日本 10 月份出口连续第二个月增长，但由于运往中国的芯片和钢铁出货量大幅下滑，增速大幅放缓。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Thursday:翻译:周四晚些时候的关键事态发展将为美国市场提供更多方向：

* U.S. weekly jobless claims, Oct industrial production, NAHB Nov housing market index, Philadelphia Fed Nov business survey, Kansas City Fed Nov business survey, Oct import/export prices and TIC data on foreign holdings of Treasuries翻译:* 美国每周初请失业金人数、10 月工业生产、NAHB 11 月房地产市场指数、费城联储 11 月商业调查、堪萨斯城联储 11 月商业调查、10 月进出口价格以及外国持有国债的 TIC 数据

* U.S. corporate earnings: Walmart, Applied Materials, Ross Stores, Bath & Body Works翻译:* 美国企业盈利：沃尔玛、应用材料公司、Ross Stores、Bath & Body Works

European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde, ECB vice president Luis de Guindos and ECB supervisor Andrea Enria all speak. Bank of England Deputy Governor Dave Ramsden speaks翻译:* 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒、美联储理事丽莎·库克、纽约联储行长约翰·威廉姆斯、美联储监管副主席迈克尔·巴尔和克利夫兰联储行长洛雷塔·梅斯特均发表讲话。欧洲央行行长拉加德、欧洲央行副行长路易斯·德金多斯和欧洲央行监事安德里亚·恩里亚均发表讲话。英格兰银行副行长戴夫·拉姆斯登讲话

item.title: 拜登在精心策划的峰会后称习近平为独裁者
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden said on Wednesday he had not changed his view that Chinese President Xi Jinping was effectively a dictator, a comment likely to land with a thud in Beijing after the two leaders held straightforward summit talks.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登周三表示，他没有改变对中国国家主席习近平实际上是独裁者的看法，在两国领导人举行直截了当的峰会会谈后，这一言论可能会在北京引起轰动。

Biden held a solo news conference after four hours of talks with Xi on the outskirts of San Francisco. At the end of the news conference, he was asked whether he still held the view that Xi was a dictator, something he said in June.翻译:拜登在旧金山郊区与习近平进行了四个小时的会谈后举行了单独的新闻发布会。在新闻发布会结束时，他被问到是否仍然认为习近平是独裁者，他在六月份曾说过这样的话。

"Look, he is. He's a dictator in the sense that he's a guy who runs a country that is a communist country that's based on a form of government totally different than ours," Biden said.翻译:“看，他是。从某种意义上说，他是一个独裁者，因为他统治着一个共产主义国家，而这个国家的政府形式与我们的政府完全不同，”拜登说。

In response, China's foreign ministry said it "strongly opposes" the remarks, without mentioning Biden by name.翻译:作为回应，中国外交部表示“强烈反对”上述言论，但没有提及拜登的名字。

"This statement is extremely wrong and irresponsible political manipulation," foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told reporters on Thursday at a routine briefing.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁在周四的例行记者会上对记者说：“这种说法是极其错误的，是不负责任的政治操弄。”

"It should be pointed out that there will always be some people with ulterior motives who attempt to incite and damage U.S.-China relations, they are doomed to fail."翻译:需要指出的是，总会有一些别有用心的人企图煽动和破坏美中关系，他们注定不会得逞。”

Mao refused to specify the identity of "some people" in answer to a follow-up question.翻译:毛泽东在回答后续问题时拒绝具体说明“一些人”的身份。

Last March Xi clinched a third term as president when nearly 3,000 members of China's rubber-stamp parliament, the National People's Congress, voted unanimously for him in an election in which there was no other candidate.翻译:去年3月，习近平获得了国家主席的第三个任期，当时中国橡皮图章议会（全国人民代表大会）的近3000名议员在没有其他候选人的选举中一致投票支持他。

Xi is considered the most powerful Chinese leader since Mao Zedong, after a decade of consolidating power in policy-making and the military, and stifling media freedoms.翻译:习近平被认为是自毛泽东以来最强大的中国领导人， 十年来巩固了决策和军队的权力，并压制了媒体自由。

There was no immediate reaction from the Chinese delegation, which had come to the United States to attend the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in San Francisco. Hundreds of critics of Beijing marched through the city's downtown around noon, chanting "free Tibet" and "free Hong Kong."

When Biden made a similar dictator reference in June, China called the remarks absurd and a provocation. But the spat did not prevent the two sides from holding extensive talks aimed at improving strained relations, which culminated in Wednesday's meeting.翻译:当拜登六月份发表类似的独裁者言论时，中国称其言论荒谬且是挑衅。但这场口角并没有阻止双方举行旨在改善紧张关系的广泛会谈，会谈在周三的会面中达到顶峰。

Writing by Steve Holland; Additional reporting by Laurie Chen in Beijing; Editing by Heather Timmons, Stephen Coates and Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:史蒂夫·霍兰德 (Steve Holland) 撰写； Laurie Chen 在北京的补充报道；编辑：Heather Timmons、Stephen Coates 和 Raju Gopalakrishnan

item.title: 哈里斯宣布承诺投入 9 亿美元，以促进女性在绿色领域的发展
item.description:
U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris will announce an initiative on Thursday to help women advance in important sectors such as clean energy, fisheries and environmental conservation in countries around the world, the White House said.翻译:白宫表示，美国副总统卡马拉·哈里斯将于周四宣布一项倡议，帮助世界各国女性在清洁能源、渔业和环境保护等重要领域取得进步。

Harris will announce some $900 million in pledges from governments, companies and civil society organizations as part of the Women in the Sustainable Economy Initiative (WISE), the White House said in a statement.翻译:白宫在一份声明中表示，哈里斯将宣布政府、公司和民间社会组织承诺提供约 9 亿美元的资金，作为妇女参与可持续经济倡议 (WISE) 的一部分。

The announcement will come as the United States hosts the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in San Francisco.

THE TAKE

Harris, who is running for re-election with President Joe Biden in 2024, is focusing on issues that are important to women ahead of a presidential election that is likely to hinge in part on voters' concerns over abortion rights.翻译:哈里斯将在 2024 年与总统乔·拜登一起竞选连任，她在总统选举前重点关注对女性重要的问题，这些问题可能部分取决于选民对堕胎权的担忧。

Harris has been a prominent voice within the Biden administration in advocating for women's rights to abortion after the Supreme Court struck down Roe vs Wade, which had cemented those rights, in 2022.

BY THE NUMBERS

The White House said countries such as Australia, Canada, Japan and Mexico and companies such as Amazon (AMZN.O), Citi (C.N) and PepsiCo (PEP.O), had committed millions of dollars to efforts to help women gain jobs, training and funding in environmentally friendly sectors.翻译:白宫表示，澳大利亚、加拿大、日本和墨西哥等国家以及亚马逊(AMZN.O) 、花旗(CN)和百事可乐(PEP.O)等公司已承诺投入数百万美元，努力帮助女性获得就业机会，环保部门的培训和资助。

Canada committed $12.52 million through 2025 for projects that support enterprises owned and run by women in Ghana, for example, and Amazon had committed to invest $50 million for "climate tech" companies led by women.翻译:例如，加拿大承诺到 2025 年为支持加纳女性拥有和经营的企业的项目提供 1252 万美元，亚马逊则承诺为女性领导的“气候技术”公司投资 5000 万美元。

"Women’s economic opportunities are linked to their ability to control, access and use land, energy and water," the White House said in a statement. "By supporting women’s work and leadership in the sectors critical to the future of our planet, we promote women’s economic security, and we advance work to address the causes and effects of climate change and bolster economic prosperity."翻译:白宫在一份声明中表示：“女性的经济机会与她们控制、获取和使用土地、能源和水的能力有关。” “通过支持女性在对地球未来至关重要的领域的工作和领导力，我们促进女性的经济安全，并推动解决气候变化的原因和影响以及促进经济繁荣的工作。”

item.title: 美国与IPEF合作伙伴就清洁能源、反腐败支柱达成一致
item.description:
Countries in the U.S.-led Indo-Pacific Economic Framework have agreed on two more "pillars" of the initiative, covering cooperation on clean energy and anti-corruption measures, U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Thursday.翻译:美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多周四表示，美国主导的印太经济框架国家已就该倡议的另外两个“支柱”达成一致，其中包括清洁能源合作和反腐败措施。

Ministers from the 14 IPEF countries also formally signed the previously agreed text of a third pillar, covering supply chain resiliency, at a meeting during the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation leaders' summit in San Francisco.翻译:在旧金山举行的亚太经济合作组织领导人峰会期间，来自 14 个 IPEF 国家的部长们还在一次会议上正式签署了先前商定的第三个支柱文本，内容涉及供应链弹性。

The agreements on three of the four IPEF pillars leaves the initiative's trade pillar in limbo, after negotiations over the past week failed to produce a deal.翻译:在过去一周的谈判未能达成协议后，IPEF 四大支柱中的三项协议使得该倡议的贸易支柱陷入困境。

The lack of an IPEF trade deal is a setback for the Biden administration. It had aimed to showcase the initiative during the APEC summit as a symbol of its economic re-engagement in Asia, providing countries a counterweight to China's growing clout in the region.翻译:缺乏 IPEF 贸易协议对拜登政府来说是一个挫折。它的目的是在亚太经合组织峰会期间展示这一倡议，作为其重新参与亚洲经济的象征，为各国提供制衡中国在该地区日益增长的影响力的力量。

But Raimondo said that the progress on supply chains, clean energy and anti-corruption had generated "tons of enthusiasm" from IPEF partners.翻译:但雷蒙多表示，供应链、清洁能源和反腐败方面的进展激发了 IPEF 合作伙伴的“极大热情”。

IPEF "is solving problems in supply chains, in infrastructure, in climate that are highly relevant to our partners," Raimondo said.翻译:雷蒙多表示，IPEF“正在解决与我们的合作伙伴高度相关的供应链、基础设施和气候方面的问题”。

The member countries also signed off on an "overarching agreement" that Raimondo said will make IPEF more "durable" by creating a ministerial-level council to review and manage all four pillars, with meetings annually. It also creates a separate commission that focuses on the Commerce-led pillars.翻译:成员国还签署了一项“总体协议”，雷蒙多表示，该协议将通过建立一个部长级理事会来审查和管理所有四个支柱，并每年举行会议，从而使 IPEF 更加“持久”。它还设立了一个单独的委员会，专注于商业主导的支柱。

Raimondo said the clean energy agreement will create avenues for more private investment into IPEF member countries to accelerate their transitions to low-carbon energy sources, including a $30 million "catalytic capital fund" that will help develop "bankable" clean energy products and provide countries technical assistance.翻译:雷蒙多表示，清洁能源协议将为更多私人投资进入IPEF成员国创造途径，以加速其向低碳能源转型，其中包括一项3000万美元的“催化资本基金”，该基金将帮助开发“可融资的”清洁能源产品，并为各国提供技术援助。

A separate group of private sector firms and non-profit groups will focus on mobilizing climate investments in IPEF countries, she said.翻译:她说，一个由私营部门公司和非营利组织组成的独立小组将专注于动员 IPEF 国家的气候投资。

On the pillar aimed at fighting corruption and tax evasion, a senior U.S. Commerce Department official said the agreement calls for both legally binding and non-binding requirements for transparency on anti-corruption and tax administration laws.翻译:关于打击腐败和逃税的支柱，美国商务部一位高级官员表示，该协议要求对反腐败和税务管理法的透明度提出具有法律约束力和非约束力的要求。

But the official said there would be no traditional dispute settlement system to enforce compliance with the anti-corruption provisions. Instead, the text calls for new capacity-building tools to help countries develop better institutions and compliance.翻译:但该官员表示，不会有传统的争端解决制度来强制遵守反腐败规定。相反，文本呼吁新的能力建设工具来帮助各国建立更好的制度和合规性。

Countries participating in IPEF are Australia, Brunei, Fiji, India, Indonesia, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, New Zealand, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam and the United States. All but India and Fiji are also members of APEC.翻译:参加IPEF的国家有澳大利亚、文莱、斐济、印度、印度尼西亚、日本、韩国、马来西亚、新西兰、菲律宾、新加坡、泰国、越南和美国。除印度和斐济外，所有国家都是亚太经合组织成员。

China's President Xi Jinping told Tesla (TSLA.O) CEO Elon Musk that he supports Tesla's development in China, according to a statement from the auto maker's Weibo Account on Thursday.翻译:据特斯拉微博账户周四发布的声明，中国国家主席习近平向特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克表示，他支持特斯拉在中国的发展。

Musk expressed his gratitude, and praised the rapid development of China's new energy vehicle sector, according to the statement.翻译:马斯克对此表示感谢，并对中国新能源汽车行业的快速发展表示赞赏。

item.title: 中国房价连续四个月下跌 或进一步走弱
item.description:
Summary:
  • Prices fall for fourth month in monthly and annual terms
  • More cities record monthly price decline
翻译:概括：
  • 月度和年度价格连续第四个月下跌
  • 更多城市房价月度下跌

China's new home prices fell for the fourth straight month with dozens of cities hit by declines, the most since the peak of the COVID-19 pandemic last year, suggesting a broader weakening in the sector that could drag on the country's overall recovery.翻译:中国的新房价格连续第四个月下跌，数十个城市出现跌幅，这是自去年COVID-19大流行高峰以来的最大跌幅，表明该行业更广泛的疲软可能会拖累该国的整体复苏。

New home prices in October dropped 0.3% month-on-month after a 0.2% dip in September, according to Reuters calculations based on National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) data.翻译:路透社根据国家统计局数据计算，继9月份下降0.2%之后，10月份新建住宅价格环比下降0.3%。

Once a key engine of economic growth accounting for around a quarter of China's economic activity, a regulatory crackdown since 2020 to curb debt has tightened liquidity and raised default risks for developers, delaying many projects.翻译:曾经是经济增长的关键引擎，约占中国经济活动的四分之一，但自2020年以来为抑制债务而实施的监管打压导致流动性收紧，并增加了开发商的违约风险，导致许多项目被推迟。

Authorities have rolled out a flurry of measures to prop up the pivotal sector, including relaxing curbs on home purchases and cutting borrowing costs but homebuyers remain cautious.翻译:当局推出了一系列措施来支撑这一关键行业，包括放宽购房限制和降低借贷成本，但购房者仍保持谨慎态度。

"The most important reason for the bearish home prices is that demand is weak, buyers don't know if pre-sold homes they buy will be delivered on the dates promised by the developers," said Ma Hong, senior analyst at Zhixin Investment Research Institute.翻译:执信投研高级分析师马洪表示，“房价看跌最重要的原因是需求疲软，买家不知道自己购买的预售房能否按开发商承诺的日期交付”。研究所。

Nomura estimated there are around 20 million pre-sold units that are either not yet constructed or delayed. That is equivalent to 20 times the number of unfinished projects by indebted developer Country Garden (2007.HK) as of end-2022.翻译:野村证券估计，约有 2000 万套预售单位尚未建成或已延迟。这相当于负债开发商碧桂园（2007.HK）截至2022年底未完工项目数量的20倍。

Bearish home prices follow data on Wednesday showing some improvement in industrial output and retail sales, which both beat expectations in October, but overall investment growth was tepid and property sales and investment slumped sharply.翻译:周三公布的数据显示，10 月份工业产出和零售销售有所改善，均超出预期，但整体投资增长不温不火，房地产销售和投资大幅下滑，导致房价下跌。

"Residents remain uncertain about income growth, and there are poor returns on financial investments in the country. They are hesitant to buy a big-ticket item like a house," Ma added.翻译:马云补充道：“居民收入增长仍存在不确定性，国内金融投资回报率较低。他们对购买房子等大件物品犹豫不决。”

Out of 70 cities, 56 reported declines in monthly prices last month, marking the most cities number since October 2020, up from 54 in September.

TWIST AND TURNS

House prices in three major cities Beijing, Shenzhen and Guangzhou all fell month-on-month in October.翻译:10月份北京、深圳、广州三大城市房价环比均下跌。

Compared with a year earlier, nationwide prices were down 0.1%, matching a decline in September, August and July.翻译:与去年同期相比，全国价格下降0.1%，与9月、8月和7月的降幅一致。

For existing home, NBS data showed 67 cities posted month-on-month price declines in October, up from 65 in September.翻译:就现房而言，国家统计局数据显示，10 月份有 67 个城市价格环比下降，高于 9 月份的 65 个。

The property market is still in adjustment and transformation, and there will be "twists and turns" in the economic recovery, Liu Aihua, spokesperson for the National Bureau of Statistics, said on Wednesday.翻译:国家统计局新闻发言人刘爱华周三表示，房地产市场仍处于调整转型之中，经济复苏将出现“波折”。

Despite the lifting of strict COVID measures late last year and a slew of support measures, the world's second-biggest economy has struggled to get back on solid footing, largely due to weak consumer confidence and the deepening property crisis.翻译:尽管去年年底取消了严格的新冠疫情措施并采取了一系列支持措施，但世界第二大经济体仍难以恢复稳固的基础，这主要是由于消费者信心疲软和房地产危机不断加深。

"House prices are expected to continue to fall in the traditionally low season of November and December," said Zhang Dawei, analyst at property agency Centaline.翻译:中原地产分析师张大伟表示：“预计11月和12月的传统淡季房价将继续下跌。”

Zhang said property policies, especially in the first-tier cities, need to be stepped up.翻译:张说，房地产政策，特别是一线城市的房地产政策，需要加强。

China's central bank plans to provide at least $137 billion of low cost financing to the country's urban village renovation and affordable housing programmes.翻译:中国央行计划为城中村改造和保障性住房项目提供至少1370亿美元的低成本融资。

item.title: 习近平告诉拜登台湾是双边关系中最大、最危险的问题
item.description:
Chinese President Xi Jinping told U.S. President Joe Biden during their four-hour meeting on Wednesday that Taiwan was the biggest, most dangerous issue in U.S.-China ties, a senior U.S. official told reporters.翻译:一位美国高级官员对记者表示，中国国家主席习近平在周三与美国总统乔·拜登进行的四个小时的会晤中告诉美国总统拜登，台湾是美中关系中最大、最危险的问题。

The official quoted Xi as saying China's preference was for peaceful "reunification" with the Chinese-claimed island of Taiwan, but that he went on to talk about conditions in which force could be used.翻译:这位官员援引习近平的话说，中国更倾向于与中国声称拥有主权的台湾岛和平“统一”，但他接着谈到了可以使用武力的条件。

Xi was trying to indicate that China is not preparing for a massive invasion of Taiwan, but that does not change the U.S. approach, the official said.翻译:这位官员表示，习近平试图表明中国没有准备大规模入侵台湾，但这并没有改变美国的做法。

"President Xi ... underscored that this was the biggest, most potentially dangerous issue in U.S.-China relations, laid out clearly that, you know, their preference was for peaceful reunification but then moved immediately to conditions that the potential use of force could be utilized," the senior U.S. official told reporters, referring to Xi's comments on Taiwan.翻译:“习主席......强调这是美中关系中最大、最具潜在危险的问题，明确指出，你知道，他们倾向于和平统一，但随后立即转向可能使用武力的条件被利用”，这位美国高级官员在谈到习近平对台湾的评论时告诉记者。

Biden responded by assuring Xi that Washington was determined to maintain peace in the region.翻译:拜登的回应是向习近平保证华盛顿决心维护该地区的和平。

"President Biden responded very clearly that the long-standing position of the United States was ... determination to maintain peace and stability," the official said.翻译:这位官员表示：“拜登总统的回应非常明确，美国的长期立场是……维护和平与稳定的决心。”

"President Xi responded: look, peace is ... all well and good but at some point we need to move towards resolution more generally," the official said.翻译:这位官员表示：“习主席回应道：看，和平……一切都很好，但在某些时候我们需要更广泛地解决问题。”

China has long taken a carrot and stick approach towards Taiwan, both promising to work for peaceful "reunification" at the same time as threatening force. In the past year and a half China has staged two large-scale war games around the island.翻译:中国长期以来对台湾采取胡萝卜加大棒的政策，既承诺致力于和平“统一”，同时又以武力相威胁。一年半来，中国已连续举行两场大规模环岛军演。

Taiwan's foreign ministry, responding to the Biden-Xi meeting, said the government has never sought to predict whether or when China might attack but was concentrating on boosting its defenses and winning international support.翻译:台湾外交部在回应拜登与习近平的会晤时表示，政府从未试图预测中国是否或何时会发动攻击，而是集中精力加强防御并赢得国际支持。

This is to "let China understand the high importance the international community attaches to peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait, the high price of starting a war, and to not act blindly without thinking," ministry spokesperson Jeff Liu said in Taipei.翻译:国防部发言人刘杰夫在台北表示，这是为了“让中国了解国际社会对台海和平稳定的高度重视，以及发动战争的高昂代价，而不是不经过思考就盲目行动”。

Taiwan will neither provoke nor "advance rashly" but will also not succumb to pressure, Liu said.翻译:刘说，台湾不会挑衅，也不会“贸然前进”，但也不会屈服于压力。

Biden and Xi met for the first time in a year on Wednesday for talks aimed at easingfriction between the two superpowers over military conflicts, drug-trafficking and artificial intelligence, and said they had made "real progress."翻译:周三，拜登和习近平一年来首次会面，进行会谈，旨在缓解两个超级大国之间在军事冲突、 贩毒和人工智能方面的摩擦，并表示他们已经取得了“真正的进展”。

China has stepped up military activity to try and force democratically governed Taiwan to accept Beijing's sovereignty, despite strong objections from Taipei government, which says only the island's people can decide their future.翻译:中国加强了军事活动，试图迫使民主治理的台湾接受北京的主权，尽管台北政府强烈反对，称只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

Senior U.S. military officers have said that Xi has ordered the People's Liberation Army to be prepared to invade Taiwan by 2027. Beijing has not ruled out using force to take the island, though it has never shared details about war preparations.翻译:美国高级军官表示，习近平已命令中国人民解放军做好2027年入侵台湾的准备。北京并未排除使用武力夺取台湾岛的可能性，但从未透露过战争准备的细节。

Reporting by Trevor Hunnicutt and Jeff Mason; Additional reporting by Ben Blanchard in Taipei; Writing by Andrea Shalal; Editing by Sandra Maler, Stephen Coates and Tom Hogue翻译:特雷弗·亨尼卡特和杰夫·梅森的报道； Ben Blanchard 在台北的补充报道；安德里亚·沙拉尔 (Andrea Shalal) 撰写；桑德拉·马勒 (Sandra Maler)、斯蒂芬·科茨 (Stephen Coates) 和汤姆·霍格 (Tom Hogue) 编辑

item.title: 要点 - 拜登和习近平会面：台湾、伊朗、芬太尼和人工智能
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden and China's Xi Jinping met for about four hours on Wednesday to discuss issues ranging from military conflicts to drug-trafficking.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平周三会面约四个小时，讨论从军事冲突到贩毒等一系列问题。

Biden welcomed the Chinese leader at the Filoli estate, a country house and gardens about 30 miles (48 km) south of San Francisco, ahead of a summit of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum.翻译:在亚太经济合作组织 (APEC) 论坛峰会召开之前，拜登在位于旧金山以南约 30 英里（48 公里）的菲洛丽庄园欢迎中国领导人。菲洛丽庄园是一座乡村别墅和花园。

Here's the key issues discussed.

TAIWAN

The two leaders had a "substantial" discussion on Taiwan, with Xi telling Biden that Taiwan was the biggest, most dangerous issue facing the two superpowers, a senior U.S. official told reporters.翻译:一位美国高级官员告诉记者，两位领导人就台湾问题进行了“实质性”讨论，习近平告诉拜登，台湾是两个超级大国面临的最大、最危险的问题。

The Chinese leader said that China had no plans for military action against Taiwan in coming years, but also discussed conditions under which force could be used, the official said.翻译:这位官员表示，这位中国领导人表示，中国没有计划在未来几年对台湾采取军事行动，但也讨论了可以使用武力的条件。

Biden said he "stressed the importance of peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait." He also asked Xi to respect Taiwan's electoral process, the U.S. official said.翻译:拜登表示，他“强调了台海和平与稳定的重要性”。这位美国官员表示，他还要求习近平尊重台湾的选举程序。

Xi responded: "Look, peace is ... all well and good but at some point we need to move towards resolution more generally," the U.S. official said.

MILITARY TALKS

Beijing said the two leaders agreed to resume military contacts that China severed after then-House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan in August 2022.翻译:北京表示，两国领导人同意恢复中国在时任众议院议长南希·佩洛西于 2022 年 8 月访问台湾后中断的军事接触。

Biden made a "very clear request" that both countries institutionalize the military-to-military dialogues, and U.S. Secretary of Defense Lloyd Austin will meet his Chinese counterpart when that person is named, a senior U.S. official said.

LEADER TO LEADER TALKS

Biden said he and Xi agreed to high-level communications.翻译:拜登表示，他和习近平同意进行高层沟通。

"He and I agreed that each one of us can pick up the phone call directly and we'll be heard immediately," Biden told reporters after the meeting.

COOPERATION AND CONCILIATION

Beijing's report of the meeting, via the Communist Party-controlled Chinese state media, emphasized the need for more cooperation, dialogue and respect. China and the United States should set an example for other countries, Xi told Biden, according to Chinese media, and promote cooperation on trade, agriculture, climate change and artificial intelligence.翻译:北京通过共产党控制的中国官方媒体对这次会议进行了报道，强调需要更多的合作、对话和尊重。据中国媒体报道，习近平告诉拜登，中美两国应为其他国家树立榜样，推动贸易、农业、气候变化和人工智能等领域的合作。

An official briefed on the talks said Beijing was also seeking a show of respect from the trip.

FENTANYL

Biden and Xi agreed to cooperate on addressing the source of the opioid fentanyl, a leading cause of drug overdoses in the United States, the U.S. official said.翻译:这位美国官员表示，拜登和习近平同意合作解决阿片类药物芬太尼的来源问题，阿片类药物芬太尼是美国吸毒过量的主要原因。

Under the agreement, China will go directly after specific chemical companies that make fentanyl precursors.

IRAN

The two leaders also discussed the unfolding crisis in the Middle East, with Biden asking China to weigh in with Iran and urge it to avoid steps that could be seen as provocative, the senior U.S. official told reporters.翻译:这位美国高级官员告诉记者，两位领导人还讨论了中东正在发生的危机，拜登要求中国对伊朗发表意见，并敦促其避免采取可能被视为挑衅的行动。

Chinese officials told the U.S. side that they had engaged in discussions with Iran on regional risks.

ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

The two leaders also discussed artificial intelligence (AI)and agreed that AI was used in military or nuclear operations, it created real risks.翻译:两位领导人还讨论了人工智能（AI），并一致认为人工智能用于军事或核行动，会带来真正的风险。

The senior U.S. official said both sides were "very much focused" on practices regarding AI that could be dangerous or destabilizing, but not ready for any mutual declaration.翻译:这位美国高级官员表示，双方“非常关注”可能危险或破坏稳定的人工智能做法，但尚未准备好相互宣布。
